message.content:
{"id": "14197", "title": "Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes", "description": "Bug 14197: When removing a working set, the changes are applied immediately.", "OB": "1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered accordingly.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.", "EB": "", "SR": "1. The changes should not be applied immediately after removing a working set. The package view should remain filtered until a new working set is selected or the package filter is manually adjusted.
2. The working set dialog should allow for seamless deletion of working sets without causing unintended changes in the package view."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
